dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset is designed for semantic urban scene understanding, providing high-quality pixel-level annotations for various urban scenes.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes Dataset

dcterms:creator: G. J. Brostow
J. Fauqueur
R. Cipolla
dcterms:description: The CamVid dataset provides high-definition ground truth annotations for semantic object classes in video, facilitating the study of semantic segmentation in dynamic environments.
dcterms:title: CamVid Dataset

dcterms:creator: R. Mottaghi
X. Chen
X. Liu
N.-G. Cho
S.-W. Lee
S. Fidler
R. Urtasun
A. Yuille
dcterms:description: The PASCAL Context dataset emphasizes the role of context in object detection and semantic segmentation, providing annotations for a wide variety of object categories in natural scenes.
dcterms:title: PASCAL Context Dataset
